How to install it ?

Download from github.

python3.6 mail.py

for dir in listdir(path_logs):
    if "2018" in dir:
        if not isfile(path_logs + dir):
            for file in listdir(path_logs + dir):
                if "m1" in file or "m2" in file:
                    list_files.append(path_logs + dir + "/" + file)
